item.title: We Love You—Please Come Back
item.description: I come to you in humility, mindful of my own weakness, yet prayerful that the preparation preceding this message may qualify me to act as an instrument in the hands of the Lord to bring help to some who are in serious need.

item.title: True Friends That Lift
item.description: It is understandable that when one has received a call and been conveyed a trust that will completely change his life forever, feelings would be sensitive and emotions very near the surface.

item.title: Finding the Way Back
item.description: The purpose of this message is to help many of you find the life you want, not the one you are living.

item.title: To Be Healed
item.description: Easter brings thoughts of the Savior, His life, His atonement, His resurrection, His love. He risen from the dead “with healing in his wings.”

item.title: The Joy of Living the Great Plan of Happiness
item.description: The scriptures record, “And I, God, created man … ; male and female created I them.” This was done spiritually in your premortal existence when you lived in the presence of your Father in Heaven. Your gender existed before you came to earth. You elec

item.title: Jesus Christ, Our Redeemer
item.description: The Redeemer loves you and will help you do the essential things that bring happiness now and forever.

item.title: Why Every Member a Missionary?
item.description: How seriously have you personally taken the Lord’s charge to share His gospel? It is a lifelong responsibility … to be addressed differently according to the various seasons of your life.

item.title: Removing Barriers to Happiness
item.description: Appreciation for ethnic, cultural, or national heritage can be very wholesome and beneficial, but it can also perpetuate patterns of life that should be set aside by a devoted Latter-day Saint.

item.title: The Power of Righteousness
item.description: Choosing to do what the Lord has defined as right will, in the long run, always lead to the best outcomes.

item.title: Receive the Temple Blessings
item.description: It is a place of peace, solitude, and inspiration. Regular attendance will enrich your life with greater purpose.

item.title: He Lives
item.description: He [Jesus Christ] has given His life that even in our weakness, we may overcome our mistakes through repentance and obedience to His gospel.

item.title: The Sanctity of Womanhood
item.description: Each of us absolutely must help each daughter of God we can to realize what sacred characteristics Father in Heaven has given her.

item.title: The Path to Peace and Joy
item.description: Are you taking full advantage of the redeeming power of repentance in your life so that you can have greater peace and joy?

item.title: First Things First
item.description: Do the best you can while on earth to have an ideal family. To help you do that, ponder and apply the principles in the proclamation on the family.

item.title: The Power of a Strong Testimony
item.description: Your personal security and happiness depend upon the strength of your testimony, for it will guide your actions in times of trial or uncertainty.

item.title: Full Conversion Brings Happiness
item.description: Your happiness now and forever is conditioned on your degree of conversion and the transformation that it brings to your life.

item.title: To Be Free of Heavy Burdens
item.description: You must trust that the Savior has given His life so that you can make the required changes in your life, changes that will bring peace.

item.title: The Sustaining Power of Faith in Times of Uncertainty and Testing
item.description: Faith in God and in His guidance through the Holy Spirit will sustain you in an increasingly more challenging world.

item.title: Realize Your Full Potential
item.description: With all my capacity I encourage you to discover who you really are. … I urge you to discern through the Spirit your divinely given capacities.

item.title: How to Live Well amid Increasing Evil
item.description: As you continue to center your mind and heart in [the Lord], He will help you have a rich and full life no matter what happens in the world around you.

item.title: Peace of Conscience and Peace of Mind
item.description: For many, relief and happiness can come by understanding the relationship between peace of conscience and peace of mind.

item.title: The Power of Preach My Gospel
item.description: I encourage you to find out how this extraordinary resource can help in your missionary efforts.

item.title: Truth Restored
item.description: The Father’s plan of salvation and happiness … will help you overcome every challenge in life.

item.title: Now Is the Time to Serve a Mission!
item.description: Exciting fields of labor the world over allow the inspiration of the Lord to call young men and women and devoted couples to challenging assignments.

item.title: The Atonement Can Secure Your Peace and Happiness
item.description: True, enduring happiness, with the accompanying strength, courage, and capacity to overcome the greatest difficulties, will come as you center your life in Jesus Christ.

item.title: Using the Supernal Gift of Prayer
item.description: Prayer is a supernal gift of our Father in Heaven to every soul.

item.title: Truth: The Foundation of Correct Decisions
item.description: A knowledge of truth is of little value unless we apply it in making correct decisions.

item.title: To Heal the Shattering Consequences of Abuse
item.description: The power of healing is inherent in the Atonement of Jesus Christ.

item.title: Honor the Priesthood and Use It Well
item.description: The perfect role model for use of the holy priesthood is our Savior, Jesus Christ. He ministered with love, compassion, and charity.

item.title: Temple Worship: The Source of Strength and Power in Times of Need
item.description: When we keep the temple covenants we have made and when we live righteously…, we have no reason to worry or to feel despondent.

item.title: To Acquire Spiritual Guidance
item.description: By careful practice, through the application of correct principles, and by being sensitive to the feelings that come, you will gain spiritual guidance.

item.title: He Lives! All Glory to His Name!
item.description: Our understanding of and faith in the Atonement of Jesus Christ will provide strength and capacity needed for a successful life.

item.title: The Transforming Power of Faith and Character
item.description: A consistent, righteous life produces an inner power and strength that can be permanently resistant to the eroding influence of sin and transgression.

item.title: The Eternal Blessings of Marriage
item.description: The temple sealing has greater meaning as life unfolds. It will help you draw ever closer together and find greater joy and fulfillment.

item.title: The Power of Scripture
item.description: Scriptures are like packets of light that illuminate our minds and give place to guidance and inspiration from on high.

item.title: How to Obtain Revelation and Inspiration for Your Personal Life
item.description: Why does the Lord want us to pray to Him and to ask? Because that is how revelation is received.

item.title: The Joy of Redeeming the Dead
item.description: “He shall plant in the hearts of the children the promises made to the fathers, and the hearts of the children shall turn to their fathers.”

item.title: For Peace at Home
item.description: One of the greatest blessings we can offer to the world is the power of a Christ-centered home where the gospel is taught, covenants are kept, and love abounds.

item.title: Personal Strength through the Atonement of Jesus Christ
item.description: Through the Atonement of Jesus Christ, each of us can become clean and the burden of our rebellion will be lifted.

item.title: “I Have Given You an Example”
item.description: Richard G. Scott explains how we can follow the Savior's example and be a loving influence for good in the lives of others.

item.title: Make the Exercise of Faith Your First Priority
item.description: We exercise our faith in Jesus Christ through regular and consistent prayer, scripture study, family home evening, and temple attendance.
